amendment.description: To fulfill the commitment of the United States to the Republic of Palau.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4317 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4317 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Hirono. (consideration: CR S3488-3490; text: CR S3489) To fulfill the commitment of the United States to the Republic of Palau.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4317 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4317 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Hirono.
